Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

::Unicron::

    "Here we are, at the beginning of a new saga. The Transfor=
mers are in for much more than they have seen. I will be returning, at some=
 point, once I have enough power. But until then I will use some of my powe=
r to alter the planet. Then Magmatron will own some of the planet, the part=
s I need."
    Cybertron glowed a bright crimson red. The Citadel of Elders=
 now becomes Magmatrons layer. Some new characters will be appearing under =
Magmatron's rule.
    Unicron traveled back in time. He reached Past Earth.=
 He was in the Neo Beast Wars near future. He placed a Time Gate on the pla=
net in a remote location. He then traveled a few days back.
    He found Ma=
gmatron trying to move his base closer to the ocean.
    "That's right, he =
needs salt water to survive. Well, that's no problem," He said to himself. =
He talked to Magmatron.
    "My minion, the time has come for you to leave =
this planet behind, you have greater goals. I will allow you time to decide=
 who will lead the Destron forces in your place."
    "It is decided, maste=
r," Magmatron called up. "Shredder will lead the Destrons here on Earth."
 =
   "Very well, I will transport you to Cybertron."
    With that Magmatron =
was gone from Past Earth. The Gateway would be discovered in a few days and=
 more Transformers may travel through it. (Leaving it as a story connector)=
